name: Cruel Arena (itch)
description:
Cruel Arena is an arcade doodle survival zombie game.
Face endless hordes and survive as much as you can!!

Will you do the best record among your friends?

Try out the demo: http://xxarabongxx.itch.io/cruel-arena-pixel-bleed...
